0.title: Побег из Шоушенка
0.prod: Frank Darabont (dir.), Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman
0.summary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

1.title: Крёстный отец
1.prod: Francis Ford Coppola (dir.), Marlon Brando, Al Pacino
1.summary: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

2.title: Крёстный отец 2
2.prod: Francis Ford Coppola (dir.), Al Pacino, Robert De Niro
2.summary: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

3.title: Темный рыцарь
3.prod: Christopher Nolan (dir.), Christian Bale, Heath Ledger
3.summary: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

4.title: 12 рaзгневанных мужчин
4.prod: Sidney Lumet (dir.), Henry Fonda, Lee J. Cobb
4.summary: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

5.title: Список Шиндлера
5.prod: Steven Spielberg (dir.), Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes
5.summary: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

6.title: Властелин колец: Возвращение короля
6.prod: Peter Jackson (dir.), Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen
6.summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

7.title: Криминальное чтиво
7.prod: Quentin Tarantino (dir.), John Travolta, Uma Thurman
7.summary: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

8.title: Хороший, плохой, злой
8.prod: Sergio Leone (dir.), Clint Eastwood, Eli Wallach
8.summary: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

9.title: Властелин колец: Братство кольца
9.prod: Peter Jackson (dir.), Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen
9.summary: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

10.title: Бойцовский клуб
10.prod: David Fincher (dir.), Brad Pitt, Edward Norton
10.summary: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

11.title: Форрест Гамп
11.prod: Robert Zemeckis (dir.), Tom Hanks, Robin Wright
11.summary: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

12.title: Начало
12.prod: Christopher Nolan (dir.), Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt
12.summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

13.title: Властелин колец: Две крепости
13.prod: Peter Jackson (dir.), Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen
13.summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

14.title: Звёздные войны. Эпизод 5: Империя наносит ответный удар
14.prod: Irvin Kershner (dir.), Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford
14.summary: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader and a bounty hunter named Boba Fett all over the galaxy.

15.title: Матрица
15.prod: Lana Wachowski (dir.), Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne
15.summary: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

16.title: Славные парни
16.prod: Martin Scorsese (dir.), Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta
16.summary: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

17.title: Пролетая над гнездом кукушки
17.prod: Milos Forman (dir.), Jack Nicholson, Louise Fletcher
17.summary: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

18.title: Семь самураев
18.prod: Akira Kurosawa (dir.), Toshirô Mifune, Takashi Shimura
18.summary: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

19.title: Семь
19.prod: David Fincher (dir.), Morgan Freeman, Brad Pitt
19.summary: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

20.title: Жизнь прекрасна
20.prod: Roberto Benigni (dir.), Roberto Benigni, Nicoletta Braschi
20.summary: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

21.title: Город Бога
21.prod: Fernando Meirelles (dir.), Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino
21.summary: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

22.title: Молчание ягнят
22.prod: Jonathan Demme (dir.), Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins
22.summary: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

23.title: Эта замечательная жизнь
23.prod: Frank Capra (dir.), James Stewart, Donna Reed
23.summary: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

24.title: Звёздные войны. Эпизод 4: Новая надежда
24.prod: George Lucas (dir.), Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford
24.summary: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

25.title: Спасти рядового Райана
25.prod: Steven Spielberg (dir.), Tom Hanks, Matt Damon
25.summary: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

26.title: Зелёная миля
26.prod: Frank Darabont (dir.), Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan
26.summary: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

27.title: Унесённые призраками
27.prod: Hayao Miyazaki (dir.), Daveigh Chase, Suzanne Pleshette
27.summary: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

28.title: Интерстеллар
28.prod: Christopher Nolan (dir.), Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway
28.summary: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

29.title: Паразиты
29.prod: Bong Joon Ho (dir.), Kang-ho Song, Lee Sun-kyun
29.summary: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

30.title: Леон
30.prod: Luc Besson (dir.), Jean Reno, Gary Oldman
30.summary: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

31.title: Seppuku
31.prod: Masaki Kobayashi (dir.), Tatsuya Nakadai, Akira Ishihama
31.summary: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

32.title: Подозрительные лица
32.prod: Bryan Singer (dir.), Kevin Spacey, Gabriel Byrne
32.summary: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

33.title: Король лев
33.prod: Roger Allers (dir.), Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons
33.summary: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

34.title: Пианист
34.prod: Roman Polanski (dir.), Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann
34.summary: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

35.title: Терминатор 2: Судный день
35.prod: James Cameron (dir.), Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton
35.summary: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

36.title: Назад в будущее
36.prod: Robert Zemeckis (dir.), Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd
36.summary: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

37.title: Американская история Икс
37.prod: Tony Kaye (dir.), Edward Norton, Edward Furlong
37.summary: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

38.title: Новые времена
38.prod: Charles Chaplin (dir.), Charles Chaplin, Paulette Goddard
38.summary: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

39.title: Гладиатор
39.prod: Ridley Scott (dir.), Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix
39.summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

40.title: Психо
40.prod: Alfred Hitchcock (dir.), Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh
40.summary: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

41.title: Отступники
41.prod: Martin Scorsese (dir.), Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon
41.summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

42.title: Огни большого города
42.prod: Charles Chaplin (dir.), Charles Chaplin, Virginia Cherrill
42.summary: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

43.prod: Olivier Nakache (dir.), François Cluzet, Omar Sy
43.summary: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

44.title: Одержимость
44.prod: Damien Chazelle (dir.), Miles Teller, J.K. Simmons
44.summary: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

45.title: Могила светлячков
45.prod: Isao Takahata (dir.), Tsutomu Tatsumi, Ayano Shiraishi
45.summary: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

46.title: Престиж
46.prod: Christopher Nolan (dir.), Christian Bale, Hugh Jackman
46.summary: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

47.title: Однажды на Диком Западе
47.prod: Sergio Leone (dir.), Henry Fonda, Charles Bronson
47.summary: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

48.title: Casablanca
48.prod: Michael Curtiz (dir.), Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman
48.summary: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

49.title: Новый кинотеатр «Парадизо»
49.prod: Giuseppe Tornatore (dir.), Philippe Noiret, Enzo Cannavale
49.summary: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

50.title: Окно во двор
50.prod: Alfred Hitchcock (dir.), James Stewart, Grace Kelly
50.summary: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

51.title: Чужой
51.prod: Ridley Scott (dir.), Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt
51.summary: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

52.title: Апокалипсис сегодня
52.prod: Francis Ford Coppola (dir.), Martin Sheen, Marlon Brando
52.summary: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

53.title: Помни
53.prod: Christopher Nolan (dir.), Guy Pearce, Carrie-Anne Moss
53.summary: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

54.title: Великий диктатор
54.prod: Charles Chaplin (dir.), Charles Chaplin, Paulette Goddard
54.summary: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

55.title: Индиана Джонс: В поисках утраченного ковчега
55.prod: Steven Spielberg (dir.), Harrison Ford, Karen Allen
55.summary: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

56.title: Джанго освобожденный
56.prod: Quentin Tarantino (dir.), Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz
56.summary: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.

57.title: Жизнь других
57.prod: Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck (dir.), Ulrich Mühe, Martina Gedeck
57.summary: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

58.title: Гамильтон
58.prod: Thomas Kail (dir.), Lin-Manuel Miranda, Phillipa Soo
58.summary: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

59.title: Тропы славы
59.prod: Stanley Kubrick (dir.), Kirk Douglas, Ralph Meeker
59.summary: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

60.title: Джокер
60.prod: Todd Phillips (dir.), Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro
60.summary: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

61.title: ВАЛЛ·И
61.prod: Andrew Stanton (dir.), Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight
61.summary: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

62.title: Сияние
62.prod: Stanley Kubrick (dir.), Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall
62.summary: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

63.title: Мстители: Война бесконечности
63.prod: Anthony Russo (dir.), Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth
63.summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

64.title: Sunset Blvd.
64.prod: Billy Wilder (dir.), William Holden, Gloria Swanson
64.summary: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

65.title: Свидетель обвинения
65.prod: Billy Wilder (dir.), Tyrone Power, Marlene Dietrich
65.summary: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

66.title: Олдбой
66.prod: Chan-wook Park (dir.), Choi Min-sik, Yoo Ji-Tae
66.summary: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

67.title: Человек-паук: Через Вселенные
67.prod: Bob Persichetti (dir.), Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson
67.summary: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

68.title: Принцесса Мононоке
68.prod: Hayao Miyazaki (dir.), Yôji Matsuda, Yuriko Ishida
68.summary: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

69.title: Доктор Стрейнджлав, или Как я научился не волноваться и полюбил атомную бомбу
69.prod: Stanley Kubrick (dir.), Peter Sellers, George C. Scott
69.summary: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a War Room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

70.title: Темный рыцарь: Возрождение легенды
70.prod: Christopher Nolan (dir.), Christian Bale, Tom Hardy
70.summary: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

71.title: Однажды в Америке
71.prod: Sergio Leone (dir.), Robert De Niro, James Woods
71.summary: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

72.title: Твоё имя
72.prod: Makoto Shinkai (dir.), Ryûnosuke Kamiki, Mone Kamishiraishi
72.summary: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

73.title: Чужие
73.prod: James Cameron (dir.), Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn
73.summary: Fifty-seven years after surviving an apocalyptic attack aboard her space vessel by merciless space creatures, Officer Ripley awakens from hyper-sleep and tries to warn anyone who will listen about the predators.

74.title: Тайна Коко
74.prod: Lee Unkrich (dir.), Anthony Gonzalez, Gael García Bernal
74.summary: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

75.title: Мстители: Финал
75.prod: Anthony Russo (dir.), Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans
75.summary: After the devastating events of Мстители: Война бесконечности (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

76.title: Капернаум
76.prod: Nadine Labaki (dir.), Zain Al Rafeea, Yordanos Shiferaw
76.summary: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

77.title: Красота по-американски
77.prod: Sam Mendes (dir.), Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening
77.summary: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

78.title: Храброе сердце
78.prod: Mel Gibson (dir.), Mel Gibson, Sophie Marceau
78.summary: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

79.title: Tengoku to jigoku
79.prod: Akira Kurosawa (dir.), Toshirô Mifune, Yutaka Sada
79.summary: An executive of a shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped and held for ransom.

80.title: Подводная лодка
80.prod: Wolfgang Petersen (dir.), Jürgen Prochnow, Herbert Grönemeyer
80.summary: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.

81.title: История игрушек
81.prod: John Lasseter (dir.), Tom Hanks, Tim Allen
81.summary: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

82.title: Три идиота
82.summary: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

83.title: Амадей
83.prod: Milos Forman (dir.), F. Murray Abraham, Tom Hulce
83.summary: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was insanely jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

84.title: Бесславные ублюдки
84.prod: Quentin Tarantino (dir.), Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger
84.summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

85.title: Умница Уилл Хантинг
85.prod: Gus Van Sant (dir.), Robin Williams, Matt Damon
85.summary: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

86.title: Звёздные войны. Эпизод 6: Возвращение джедая
86.prod: Richard Marquand (dir.), Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford
86.summary: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

87.title: Звёздочки на земле
87.prod: Aamir Khan (dir.), Darsheel Safary, Aamir Khan
87.summary: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

88.title: Бешеные псы
88.prod: Quentin Tarantino (dir.), Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth
88.summary: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

89.title: 2001 год: Космическая одиссея
89.prod: Stanley Kubrick (dir.), Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood
89.summary: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.

90.title: Реквием по мечте
90.prod: Darren Aronofsky (dir.), Ellen Burstyn, Jared Leto
90.summary: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

91.title: Охота
91.prod: Thomas Vinterberg (dir.), Mads Mikkelsen, Thomas Bo Larsen
91.summary: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

92.title: Головокружение
92.prod: Alfred Hitchcock (dir.), James Stewart, Kim Novak
92.summary: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.

93.title: М убийца
93.prod: Fritz Lang (dir.), Peter Lorre, Ellen Widmann
93.summary: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

94.title: Вечное сияние чистого разума
94.prod: Michel Gondry (dir.), Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet
94.summary: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

95.title: Гражданин Кейн
95.prod: Orson Welles (dir.), Orson Welles, Joseph Cotten
95.summary: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance; 'Rosebud'.

96.title: Дангал
96.prod: Nitesh Tiwari (dir.), Aamir Khan, Sakshi Tanwar
96.summary: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

97.title: Поющие под дождём
97.prod: Stanley Donen (dir.), Gene Kelly, Donald O'Connor
97.summary: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

98.title: Малыш
98.prod: Charles Chaplin (dir.), Charles Chaplin, Edna Purviance
98.summary: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

99.title: Похитители велосипедов
99.prod: Vittorio De Sica (dir.), Lamberto Maggiorani, Enzo Staiola
99.summary: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen. He and his son set out to find it.

100.title: Цельнометаллическая оболочка
100.prod: Stanley Kubrick (dir.), Matthew Modine, R. Lee Ermey
100.summary: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

101.title: Иди и смотри
101.prod: Elem Klimov (dir.), Aleksey Kravchenko, Olga Mironova
101.summary: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

102.title: Большой куш
102.prod: Guy Ritchie (dir.), Jason Statham, Brad Pitt
102.summary: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

103.title: Ikiru
103.prod: Akira Kurosawa (dir.), Takashi Shimura, Nobuo Kaneko
103.summary: A bureaucrat tries to find a meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

104.title: На север через северо-запад
104.prod: Alfred Hitchcock (dir.), Cary Grant, Eva Marie Saint
104.summary: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.

105.title: Заводной апельсин
105.prod: Stanley Kubrick (dir.), Malcolm McDowell, Patrick Magee
105.summary: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

106.title: Лицо со шрамом
106.prod: Brian De Palma (dir.), Al Pacino, Michelle Pfeiffer
106.summary: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

107.prod: Sam Mendes (dir.), Dean-Charles Chapman, George MacKay
107.summary: April 6th, 1917. As a regiment assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

108.title: Таксист
108.prod: Martin Scorsese (dir.), Robert De Niro, Jodie Foster
108.summary: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.

109.title: Пожары
109.prod: Denis Villeneuve (dir.), Lubna Azabal, Mélissa Désormeaux-Poulin
109.summary: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

110.title: Развод Надера и Симин
110.prod: Asghar Farhadi (dir.), Payman Maadi, Leila Hatami
110.summary: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

111.title: История игрушек 3
111.prod: Lee Unkrich (dir.), Tom Hanks, Tim Allen
111.summary: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

112.title: Афера
112.prod: George Roy Hill (dir.), Paul Newman, Robert Redford
112.summary: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

113.title: Лоуренс Аравийский
113.prod: David Lean (dir.), Peter O'Toole, Alec Guinness
113.summary: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

114.title: Амели
114.prod: Jean-Pierre Jeunet (dir.), Audrey Tautou, Mathieu Kassovitz
114.summary: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

115.title: Метрополис
115.prod: Fritz Lang (dir.), Brigitte Helm, Alfred Abel
115.summary: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

116.title: Квартира
116.prod: Billy Wilder (dir.), Jack Lemmon, Shirley MacLaine
116.summary: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

117.title: На несколько долларов больше
117.prod: Sergio Leone (dir.), Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef
117.summary: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

118.title: Двойная страховка
118.prod: Billy Wilder (dir.), Fred MacMurray, Barbara Stanwyck
118.summary: An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of an insurance investigator.

119.title: Убить пересмешника
119.prod: Robert Mulligan (dir.), Gregory Peck, John Megna
119.summary: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.

120.title: Вверх
120.prod: Pete Docter (dir.), Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai
120.summary: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

121.title: Индиана Джонс и последний крестовый поход
121.prod: Steven Spielberg (dir.), Harrison Ford, Sean Connery
121.summary: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Professor Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

122.title: Схватка
122.prod: Michael Mann (dir.), Al Pacino, Robert De Niro
122.summary: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

123.title: Секреты Лос-Анджелеса
123.prod: Curtis Hanson (dir.), Kevin Spacey, Russell Crowe
123.summary: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

124.title: Зеленая книга
124.prod: Peter Farrelly (dir.), Viggo Mortensen, Mahershala Ali
124.summary: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

125.title: Крепкий орешек
125.prod: John McTiernan (dir.), Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman
125.summary: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

126.title: Бэтмен: Начало
126.prod: Christopher Nolan (dir.), Christian Bale, Michael Caine
126.summary: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

127.title: Монти Пайтон и священный Грааль
127.prod: Terry Gilliam (dir.), Graham Chapman, John Cleese
127.summary: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

128.title: Телохранитель
128.prod: Akira Kurosawa (dir.), Toshirô Mifune, Eijirô Tôno
128.summary: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

129.title: Расёмон
129.prod: Akira Kurosawa (dir.), Toshirô Mifune, Machiko Kyô
129.summary: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

130.title: Бункер
130.prod: Oliver Hirschbiegel (dir.), Bruno Ganz, Alexandra Maria Lara
130.summary: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

131.title: Дети небес
131.prod: Majid Majidi (dir.), Mohammad Amir Naji, Amir Farrokh Hashemian
131.summary: After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.

132.title: Ран
132.prod: Akira Kurosawa (dir.), Tatsuya Nakadai, Akira Terao
132.summary: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

133.title: Непрощенный
133.prod: Clint Eastwood (dir.), Clint Eastwood, Gene Hackman
133.summary: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

134.title: В джазе только девушки
134.prod: Billy Wilder (dir.), Marilyn Monroe, Tony Curtis
134.summary: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

135.title: Лига справедливости Зака Снайдера
135.prod: Zack Snyder (dir.), Henry Cavill, Ben Affleck
135.summary: Determined to ensure Superman's ultimate sacrifice was not in vain, Bruce Wayne aligns forces with Diana Prince with plans to recruit a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions.

136.title: Ходячий замок
136.prod: Hayao Miyazaki (dir.), Chieko Baishô, Takuya Kimura
136.summary: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

137.title: All About Eve
137.prod: Joseph L. Mankiewicz (dir.), Bette Davis, Anne Baxter
137.summary: A seemingly timid but secretly ruthless ingénue insinuates herself into the lives of an aging Broadway star and her circle of theater friends.

138.title: Казино
138.prod: Martin Scorsese (dir.), Robert De Niro, Sharon Stone
138.summary: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast-living and fast-loving socialite.

139.title: Игры разума
139.prod: Ron Howard (dir.), Russell Crowe, Ed Harris
139.summary: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

140.title: Волк с Уолл-стрит
140.prod: Martin Scorsese (dir.), Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill
140.summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

141.title: Большой побег
141.prod: John Sturges (dir.), Steve McQueen, James Garner
141.summary: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

142.title: Лабиринт Фавна
142.prod: Guillermo del Toro (dir.), Ivana Baquero, Ariadna Gil
142.summary: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

143.title: Нефть
143.prod: Paul Thomas Anderson (dir.), Daniel Day-Lewis, Paul Dano
143.summary: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

144.title: Тайна в его глазах
144.prod: Juan José Campanella (dir.), Ricardo Darín, Soledad Villamil
144.summary: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

145.title: Карты, деньги, два ствола
145.prod: Guy Ritchie (dir.), Jason Flemyng, Dexter Fletcher
145.summary: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

146.title: Нюрнбергский процесс
146.prod: Stanley Kramer (dir.), Spencer Tracy, Burt Lancaster
146.summary: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.

147.title: Бешеный бык
147.prod: Martin Scorsese (dir.), Robert De Niro, Cathy Moriarty
147.summary: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

148.title: Мой сосед Тоторо
148.prod: Hayao Miyazaki (dir.), Hitoshi Takagi, Noriko Hidaka
148.summary: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

149.title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
149.prod: John Huston (dir.), Humphrey Bogart, Walter Huston
149.summary: Two Americans searching for work in Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

150.title: В случае убийства набирайте «М»
150.prod: Alfred Hitchcock (dir.), Ray Milland, Grace Kelly
150.summary: A former tennis player tries to arrange his wife's murder after learning of her affair.

151.title: Остров проклятых
151.prod: Martin Scorsese (dir.), Leonardo DiCaprio, Emily Mortimer
151.summary: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

152.title: Три билборда на границе Эббинга, Миссури
152.prod: Martin McDonagh (dir.), Frances McDormand, Woody Harrelson
152.summary: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

153.title: Китайский квартал
153.prod: Roman Polanski (dir.), Jack Nicholson, Faye Dunaway
153.summary: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

154.title: The Gold Rush
154.prod: Charles Chaplin (dir.), Charles Chaplin, Mack Swain
154.summary: A prospector goes to the Klondike in search of gold and finds it and more.

155.title: Мой отец и мой сын
155.prod: Çagan Irmak (dir.), Eser Sariyar, Çetin Tekindor
155.summary: The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.

156.title: Старикам тут не место
156.prod: Ethan Coen (dir.), Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem
156.summary: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

157.title: «V» значит Вендетта
157.prod: James McTeigue (dir.), Hugo Weaving, Natalie Portman
157.summary: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

158.title: Головоломка
158.prod: Pete Docter (dir.), Amy Poehler, Bill Hader
158.summary: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

159.title: Нечто
159.prod: John Carpenter (dir.), Kurt Russell, Wilford Brimley
159.summary: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

160.title: Человек-слон
160.prod: David Lynch (dir.), Anthony Hopkins, John Hurt
160.summary: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.

161.title: Седьмая печать
161.prod: Ingmar Bergman (dir.), Max von Sydow, Gunnar Björnstrand
161.summary: A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

162.title: Воин
162.prod: Gavin O'Connor (dir.), Tom Hardy, Nick Nolte
162.summary: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

163.title: Шестое чувство
163.prod: M. Night Shyamalan (dir.), Bruce Willis, Haley Joel Osment
163.summary: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

164.title: Клаус
164.prod: Sergio Pablos (dir.), Jason Schwartzman, J.K. Simmons
164.summary: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

165.title: Парк юрского периода
165.prod: Steven Spielberg (dir.), Sam Neill, Laura Dern
165.summary: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

166.title: На игле
166.prod: Danny Boyle (dir.), Ewan McGregor, Ewen Bremner
166.summary: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

167.title: Шоу Трумана
167.prod: Peter Weir (dir.), Jim Carrey, Ed Harris
167.summary: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

168.title: Унесённые ветром
168.prod: Victor Fleming (dir.), Clark Gable, Vivien Leigh
168.summary: A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

169.title: В поисках Немо
169.prod: Andrew Stanton (dir.), Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres
169.summary: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

170.title: Сталкер
170.prod: Andrei Tarkovsky (dir.), Alisa Freyndlikh, Aleksandr Kaydanovskiy
170.summary: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

171.title: Земляничная поляна
171.prod: Ingmar Bergman (dir.), Victor Sjöström, Bibi Andersson
171.summary: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

172.title: Воспоминания об убийстве
172.prod: Bong Joon Ho (dir.), Kang-ho Song, Kim Sang-kyung
172.summary: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

173.title: Убить Билла
173.prod: Quentin Tarantino (dir.), Uma Thurman, David Carradine
173.summary: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

174.title: Бегущий по лезвию
174.prod: Ridley Scott (dir.), Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer
174.summary: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

175.title: Мост через реку Квай
175.prod: David Lean (dir.), William Holden, Alec Guinness
175.summary: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors, not knowing that the allied forces are planning to destroy it.

176.title: Фарго
176.prod: Joel Coen (dir.), William H. Macy, Frances McDormand
176.summary: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

177.title: Дикие истории
177.prod: Damián Szifron (dir.), Darío Grandinetti, María Marull
177.summary: Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

178.title: Комната
178.prod: Lenny Abrahamson (dir.), Brie Larson, Jacob Tremblay
178.summary: Held captive for 7 years in an enclosed space, a woman and her young son finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.

179.title: Токийская повесть
179.prod: Yasujirô Ozu (dir.), Chishû Ryû, Chieko Higashiyama
179.summary: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

180.title: Третий человек
180.prod: Carol Reed (dir.), Orson Welles, Joseph Cotten
180.summary: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

181.title: Гран Торино
181.prod: Clint Eastwood (dir.), Clint Eastwood, Bee Vang
181.summary: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, Thao Lor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.

182.title: В порту
182.prod: Elia Kazan (dir.), Marlon Brando, Karl Malden
182.summary: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

183.title: Охотник на оленей
183.prod: Michael Cimino (dir.), Robert De Niro, Christopher Walken
183.summary: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

184.title: Во имя отца
184.prod: Jim Sheridan (dir.), Daniel Day-Lewis, Pete Postlethwaite
184.summary: A man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

185.title: Мэри и Макс
185.prod: Adam Elliot (dir.), Toni Collette, Philip Seymour Hoffman
185.summary: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

186.title: Перед рассветом
186.prod: Richard Linklater (dir.), Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy
186.summary: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

187.title: Отель «Гранд Будапешт»
187.prod: Wes Anderson (dir.), Ralph Fiennes, F. Murray Abraham
187.summary: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

188.title: Поймай меня, если сможешь
188.prod: Steven Spielberg (dir.), Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hanks
188.summary: Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

189.title: Исчезнувшая
189.prod: David Fincher (dir.), Ben Affleck, Rosamund Pike
189.summary: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

190.title: По соображениям совести
190.prod: Mel Gibson (dir.), Andrew Garfield, Sam Worthington
190.summary: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people, and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

191.title: Пленницы
191.prod: Denis Villeneuve (dir.), Hugh Jackman, Jake Gyllenhaal
191.summary: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

192.title: Персона
192.prod: Ingmar Bergman (dir.), Bibi Andersson, Liv Ullmann
192.summary: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

193.title: Стреляйте в пианиста
193.summary: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

194.title: Шерлок младший
194.prod: Buster Keaton (dir.), Buster Keaton, Kathryn McGuire
194.summary: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

195.title: Большой Лебовски
195.prod: Joel Coen (dir.), Jeff Bridges, John Goodman
195.summary: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

196.title: Барри Линдон
196.prod: Stanley Kubrick (dir.), Ryan O'Neal, Marisa Berenson
196.summary: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

197.title: Паровоз Генерал
197.prod: Clyde Bruckman (dir.), Buster Keaton, Marion Mack
197.summary: When Union spies steal an engineer's beloved locomotive, he pursues it single-handedly and straight through enemy lines.

198.title: To Be or Not to Be
198.prod: Ernst Lubitsch (dir.), Carole Lombard, Jack Benny
198.summary: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

199.title: Как приручить дракона
199.prod: Dean DeBlois (dir.), Jay Baruchel, Gerard Butler
199.summary: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

200.title: Ford против Ferrari
200.prod: James Mangold (dir.), Matt Damon, Christian Bale
200.summary: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

201.title: 12 лет рабства
201.prod: Steve McQueen (dir.), Chiwetel Ejiofor, Michael Kenneth Williams
201.summary: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

202.title: Бандит
202.prod: Yavuz Turgul (dir.), Sener Sen, Ugur Yücel
202.summary: Baran the Bandit, released from prison after 35 years, searches for vengeance and his lover.

203.title: Höstsonaten
203.prod: Ingmar Bergman (dir.), Ingrid Bergman, Liv Ullmann
203.summary: A married daughter who longs for her mother's love is visited by the latter, a successful concert pianist.

204.title: Мистер Смит едет в Вашингтон
204.prod: Frank Capra (dir.), James Stewart, Jean Arthur
204.summary: A naive man is appointed to fill a vacancy in the United States Senate. His plans promptly collide with political corruption, but he doesn't back down.

205.title: Anand
205.prod: Hrishikesh Mukherjee (dir.), Rajesh Khanna, Amitabh Bachchan
205.summary: The story of a terminally ill man who wishes to live life to the fullest before the inevitable occurs, as told by his best friend.

206.title: Безумный Макс: Дорога ярости
206.prod: George Miller (dir.), Tom Hardy, Charlize Theron
206.summary: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

207.title: Общество мёртвых поэтов
207.prod: Peter Weir (dir.), Robin Williams, Robert Sean Leonard
207.summary: Maverick teacher John Keating uses poetry to embolden his boarding school students to new heights of self-expression.

208.title: Малышка на миллион
208.prod: Clint Eastwood (dir.), Hilary Swank, Clint Eastwood
208.summary: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

209.title: Гарри Поттер и Дары смерти: Часть II
209.prod: David Yates (dir.), Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson
209.summary: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

210.title: Останься со мной
210.prod: Rob Reiner (dir.), Wil Wheaton, River Phoenix
210.summary: After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

211.title: Телесеть
211.prod: Sidney Lumet (dir.), Faye Dunaway, William Holden
211.summary: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.

212.title: Бен-Гур
212.prod: William Wyler (dir.), Charlton Heston, Jack Hawkins
212.summary: After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

213.title: Хатико: самый верный друг
213.prod: Lasse Hallström (dir.), Richard Gere, Joan Allen
213.summary: A college professor bonds with an abandoned dog he takes into his home.

214.title: Служанка
214.prod: Chan-wook Park (dir.), Kim Min-hee, Jung-woo Ha
214.summary: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

215.title: Хладнокровный Люк
215.prod: Stuart Rosenberg (dir.), Paul Newman, George Kennedy
215.summary: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

216.title: Логан
216.prod: James Mangold (dir.), Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart
216.summary: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

217.title: Взвод
217.prod: Oliver Stone (dir.), Charlie Sheen, Tom Berenger
217.summary: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

218.title: В диких условиях
218.prod: Sean Penn (dir.), Emile Hirsch, Vince Vaughn
218.summary: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

219.title: Плата за страх
219.prod: Henri-Georges Clouzot (dir.), Yves Montand, Charles Vanel
219.summary: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

220.title: Гонка
220.prod: Ron Howard (dir.), Daniel Brühl, Chris Hemsworth
220.summary: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

221.title: Золушка
221.prod: Ram Kumar (dir.), Vishnu Vishal, Amala Paul
221.summary: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

222.title: Ненависть
222.prod: Mathieu Kassovitz (dir.), Vincent Cassel, Hubert Koundé
222.summary: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

223.title: Житие Брайана по Монти Пайтон
223.prod: Terry Jones (dir.), Graham Chapman, John Cleese
223.summary: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

224.title: Четыреста ударов
224.prod: François Truffaut (dir.), Jean-Pierre Léaud, Albert Rémy
224.summary: A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

225.title: Страсти Жанны д'Арк
225.prod: Carl Theodor Dreyer (dir.), Maria Falconetti, Eugene Silvain
225.summary: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

226.title: В центре внимания
226.prod: Tom McCarthy (dir.), Mark Ruffalo, Michael Keaton
226.summary: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

227.title: Отель «Руанда»
227.prod: Terry George (dir.), Don Cheadle, Sophie Okonedo
227.summary: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

228.title: Душа
228.prod: Pete Docter (dir.), Jamie Foxx, Tina Fey
228.summary: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

229.title: Банды Вассейпура
229.prod: Anurag Kashyap (dir.), Manoj Bajpayee, Richa Chadha
229.summary: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

230.title: Сука любовь
230.prod: Alejandro G. Iñárritu (dir.), Emilio Echevarría, Gael García Bernal
230.summary: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.

231.title: Андрей Рублёв
231.prod: Andrei Tarkovsky (dir.), Anatoliy Solonitsyn, Ivan Lapikov
231.summary: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer St. Andrei Rublev.

232.title: Корпорация монстров
232.prod: Pete Docter (dir.), Billy Crystal, John Goodman
232.summary: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, 2 monsters realize things may not be what they think.

233.title: Рокки
233.prod: John G. Avildsen (dir.), Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire
233.summary: A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight a heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

234.title: Навсикая из Долины ветров
234.prod: Hayao Miyazaki (dir.), Sumi Shimamoto, Mahito Tsujimura
234.summary: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

235.title: Ребекка
235.prod: Alfred Hitchcock (dir.), Laurence Olivier, Joan Fontaine
235.summary: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

236.title: Dom za vesanje
236.prod: Emir Kusturica (dir.), Davor Dujmovic, Bora Todorovic
236.summary: In this luminous tale set in the area around Sarajevo and in Italy, Perhan, an engaging young Romany (gypsy) with telekinetic powers, is seduced by the quick-cash world of petty crime, which threatens to destroy him and those he loves.

237.title: Перед закатом
237.prod: Richard Linklater (dir.), Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy
237.summary: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

238.title: Любовное настроение
238.prod: Kar-Wai Wong (dir.), Tony Chiu-Wai Leung, Maggie Cheung
238.summary: Two neighbors, a woman and a man, form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.

239.title: Цвет шафрана
239.prod: Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra (dir.), Aamir Khan, Soha Ali Khan
239.summary: The story of six young Indians who assist an English woman to film a documentary on the freedom fighters from their past, and the events that lead them to relive the long-forgotten saga of freedom.

240.title: Du rififi chez les hommes
240.prod: Jules Dassin (dir.), Jean Servais, Carl Möhner
240.summary: Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...

241.title: Париж, Техас
241.prod: Wim Wenders (dir.), Harry Dean Stanton, Nastassja Kinski
241.summary: Travis Henderson, an aimless drifter who has been missing for four years, wanders out of the desert and must reconnect with society, himself, his life, and his family.

242.title: Видимость
242.summary: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

243.title: Портрет девушки в огне
243.prod: Céline Sciamma (dir.), Noémie Merlant, Adèle Haenel
243.summary: On an isolated island in Brittany at the end of the eighteenth century, a female painter is obliged to paint a wedding portrait of a young woman.

244.title: Это случилось однажды ночью
244.prod: Frank Capra (dir.), Clark Gable, Claudette Colbert
244.summary: A renegade reporter and a crazy young heiress meet on a bus heading for New York, and end up stuck with each other when the bus leaves them behind at one of the stops.

245.title: Конец Евангелиона
245.prod: Hideaki Anno (dir.), Megumi Ogata, Megumi Hayashibara
245.summary: Concurrent theatrical ending of the TV series Евангелион (1995).

246.title: Форма голоса
246.prod: Naoko Yamada (dir.), Miyu Irino, Saori Hayami
246.summary: A young man is ostracized by his classmates after he bullies a deaf girl to the point where she moves away. Years later, he sets off on a path for redemption.

247.title: Видимость
247.prod: Nishikant Kamat (dir.), Ajay Devgn, Shriya Saran
247.summary: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

248.title: Мандарины
248.prod: Zaza Urushadze (dir.), Lembit Ulfsak, Elmo Nüganen
248.summary: In 1992, war rages in Abkhazia, a breakaway region of Georgia. An Estonian man Ivo has decided to stay behind and harvest his crops of tangerines. In a bloody conflict at his door, a wounded man is left behind, and Ivo takes him in.

249.title: Невидимый гость
249.prod: Oriol Paulo (dir.), Mario Casas, Ana Wagener
249.summary: A successful entrepreneur accused of murder and a witness preparation expert have less than three hours to come up with an impregnable defense.
